page.title: 19A mother's day in B.S.E.
page.content: A normal day begins at about 6-30am with a shower and hairwash. Then she puts some oldish clothes on. She makes the lunches, irons any clothes needed that day, gets the breakfast and sees us off to school. Then, every day except Tuesday and Thursday, it's a dash upstairs, a quick change into decent clothes, a dab of make up here and there, and off to work. She drives to work which takes about 10 minutes, then works from 9.00am till about 1.00pm, depending on the amount of work. After that, she either comes home or does the shopping. When she does get home, she starts the cleaning, either dusting or hoovering. When that's finished for the day, she starts on tea which we eat when we come in about 4.00pm. The house is then in a mess till bedtime.
